definition: continually changing, especially as from one abode or occupation to another, a wanderer who has no established residence or visible means of support
details:
adjective
- continually changing, especially as from one abode or occupation to another
= example: continually changing, especially as from one abode or occupation to another
noun
- a wanderer who has no established residence or visible means of support
= example: a wanderer who has no established residence or visible means of support
